Articles.Content:
Anyone aware of a mk2-compliant rover cockpit? Trying to make a rover around a mk2 passenger cabin, and piecing one together from flaps and external seats is a little wonky. 

Heres a doodle of what I'm talking about:

Or something like that.
Not overly sure which way to look at that doodle but the Mk2 expansion might have what you need. It has a couple pods made for rovers/helicopters. Here's a link:

7 hours ago, Benji13 said:

Not overly sure which way to look at that doodle but the Mk2 expansion might have what you need. It has a couple pods made for rovers/helicopters. Here's a link:

 

Hah! Yeah, it's a profile sketch, facing left. Sorry, I did it in 10 seconds on a browser base sketch tool on an iphone. You've got windows, and a door there. Or so I claim. 

Thanks for the link. I've checked that one out before. [picky] That cockpit looks a little too WWII bomber-ish [/picky]. Hold on, let me google something up for ya...

Close enough. You remember Van Damme's car from TimeCop?

But really anything that looks like a rover cockpit, not an aircraft cockpit would be the bees knees.

5 hours ago, DrunkenKerbalnaut said:

Hah! Yeah, it's a profile sketch, facing left. Sorry, I did it in 10 seconds on a browser base sketch tool on an iphone. You've got windows, and a door there. Or so I claim. 

Thanks for the link. I've checked that one out before. [picky] That cockpit looks a little too WWII bomber-ish [/picky]. Hold on, let me google something up for ya...

Close enough. You remember Van Damme's car from TimeCop?

But really anything that looks like a rover cockpit, not an aircraft cockpit would be the bees knees. 

Hmmm. I'm pretty new to part modeling so I wouldn't really be able to make something like that but you could always put in a suggestion to a mod maker in the hopes that they'll make one for you.
